title: 1919Type: GEOVLAD
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture7_5650.png)
  
Hey friends!

I have now made available GEOVLAD, based on the posters of Georgii and Vladimir Stenberg. I call this particular release Geovlad Basic, I'll be coming out with a full Cyrillic set when I work out some kinks!

[Geovlad Basic](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052841/http:/www.1919type.com/geovlad.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417052841im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture8_5756.png)
author: scottsullivan
